scripts.postinstall: cp vendor/closure/compiler.jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler && cp vendor/tsickle/* node_modules/tsickle/build/src
scripts.build: npm run clean && ngc && ./build_closure.sh && npm run copy
scripts.copy: cp index.html dist/index.html && cp vendor/angular2-polyfills.min.js dist/angular2-polyfills.min.js && cp vendor/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp -r images dist/images
